Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of the event.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The activity Id.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The user who initiated the connection.
Columns.Name: UserName

Columns.Description: The state of the connection.
Columns.Name: State

Columns.Description: The OS of the client that is connecting (if available).
Columns.Name: ClientOS

Columns.Description: The version of the client that is connecting (if available).
Columns.Name: ClientVersion

Columns.Description: The type of the client that is connecting (if available).
Columns.Name: ClientType

Columns.Description: The remote IP address from the client side.
Columns.Name: ClientSideIPAddress

Columns.Description: The predecessor Correlation Id of the connection, if the current connection is an auto-reconnect.
Columns.Name: PredecessorConnectionId

Columns.Description: The type of connection - either RAIL (RemoteApp Integrated Locally) or Desktop.
Columns.Name: ConnectionType

Columns.Description: The alias of the app that the user attempted to connect to.
Columns.Name: ResourceAlias

Columns.Description: The FQDN of the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostName

Columns.Description: The Azure VM Id of the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostAzureVmId

Columns.Description: The IP address of the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostIPAddress

Columns.Description: The OS version of the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostOSVersion

Columns.Description: The OS SKU description of the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostOSDescription

Columns.Description: The version of the WVD Agent running on the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostAgentVersion

Columns.Description: The version of the WVD RDP Stack running on the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostSxSStackVersion

Columns.Description: The Session Id of WVD RDP Stack running on the machine where the user connection was orchestrated.
Columns.Name: SessionHostSessionId

Columns.Description: The AAD tenenat Id of the user.
Columns.Name: AadTenantId

Columns.Description: The region of the WVD Gateway for the server side user connection.
Columns.Name: GatewayRegion

Columns.Description: Indicates whether WVD RDP Stack uses UDP protocol on current user connection.
Columns.Name: UdpUse

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
